name: High Zeaz
description:
You hate to see it. Some savage pirates took you prisoner. They beat you, fed you rotten, infected garbage, and chained you up like an animal. They treated you like trash until you died.

But then, you came back.

AND ATE THEM ALL.

Now that you've gotten revenge and come to your senses, it's time to get real. You're stranded out at sea with nothing but a trashed, empty pirate ship and the hooks that once held you hostage, your body is decaying rapidly, and you have no idea how to make it back to the land of the living. 

So, why not lean into your newfound freedom?

Sail the High Zeaz, find other paranormal freaks, and become the greatest pirate who died and lived! Use those hooks to your advantage to swing around ships or quickly propel yourself toward enemies, killing them with your swift trickery and fancy footwork! Glory-kill the big guys to gain their limbs to extend your reign over the water! You ARRRRRR A ZOMBIE PIRATE MOVING AND SHOO- well, I guess technically not shooting, but aren't grappling hooks more fun, anyways?

Made for the Game Dev Club Halloween Game Jam, based on "Zombified" and "💀"
